txt.en: Without their lackeys, the hill-trolls will find it difficult to maintain their presence in Misthallow. Lumrog has been made safer, if not completely safe, by your efforts.

Within the encampment of Lumrog, Orcs and hobgoblins serve foul hill-trolls that make this place home. If these creatures are dispatched, the trolls will find it difficult to maintain their presence in Misthallow.

Within the encampment of Lumrog, Orcs and hobgoblins serve foul hill-trolls that make this place home. If these creatures are dispatched, the trolls will find it difficult to maintain their presence in Misthallow.
Defeated Orcs or hobgoblins in Lumrog ([placeholder]/[placeholder])

The encampment of Lumrog echoes not only with the heavy footfalls of hill-trolls, but also with the shrieks and cries of their servants and allies. If these Orcs and hobgoblins are slain, the trolls will find it difficult to maintain their presence in Misthallow.
